metadata.title: CVE-2024-36123 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Citizen is a MediaWiki skin that makes extensions part of the cohesiveexperience. The page `MediaWiki:Tagline` has its contents used unescaped,so custom HTML (including Javascript) can be injected by someone with theability to edit the MediaWiki namespace (typically those with the`editinterface` permission, or sysops). This vulnerability is fixed in2.16.0.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
